title: [RESEARCH] Custom LLM provider vs llm crate - streaming+tools issues

logs.msg: Tools are ALWAYS present for coding agent. Streaming+tools is not edge case, it's the primary use case. Non-streaming fallback is degraded UX. This is a blocker for Google provider and potentially others. Need crate that supports streaming+tools for all providers, or build custom.
Design goal: modular streaming interface that works for all providers. Research each provider's streaming API format (SSE, chunks, etc). All major terminal agents stream - we should too.
Decision: direct Anthropic client for caching support
